EmailTemplate.name: NavDB countersigned notice
EmailTemplate.subject: NavDB countersigned notice
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear,
Thank you for returning the signed service agreement. Enclosed is a fully executed document for your records. If we have not already, we will be sending a follow up email with any download or payment instructions you may need to move forward.
We are pleased to have you as a customer and look forward to working with you in the future. If you have any questions or concerns, please include your contract # and/or case # in an email to Database Services Accounts at dsa@honeywell.com.
Regards,
{!echosign_dev1__SIGN_Agreement__r.Case__c.OwnerFirstName}
Account Management Representative
Database Services Accounts
Email: dsa@honeywell.com
M&PM Aero Services
Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com
For after hours assistance with AOG situations please call our 24/7 Tech Ops Center at 602-365-6500 or 855-808-6500
